issuetype.description: An improvement or enhancement to an existing feature or task.
issuetype.name: Improvement

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description:
h3. Hello, 

i have received a error message when I launch a testing app,  telling me that i have to update the xcode agreement  if i want to see the emulator… 

I do that, i open the Xcode and  i agree the agreement.

Reboot the computer, launch again the appstudio, and when i launch the app appear this error message..

Failed to parse app's Info.plist: /Users/user/Documents/Appcelerator_Studio_Workspace/RP/build/iphone/build/Products/Debug-iphonesimulator/RP.app/Info.plist

and the Xcode launcher don´t start and i can not see the app..
there’s an app studio update but i’m not sure if updating the app studio. will work again.

what i can i do.?? thanks in advance

Please, can you reply to me to .. javier@ahora94.com
fields.summary: the xcode agreement makes the apple emulator doesn´t work

comments.body: You need to update to Titanium SDK 5.5.1 *and* Titanium CLI 5.5.1 to build apps with Xcode 8. See [out release blog|https://www.appcelerator.com/blog/2016/09/ga-release-for-titanium-sdk-5-5-1-appcelerator-cli-5-5-1//] for more infos and install-guide.
